name: Warding Sphere
desc:
You inscribe multiple Circles of Warding onto every creature in range that you choose. These circles move with the owner. They are dispelled if the owner moves in a way that puts a summoned or reanimated creature inside.

A summoned creature can spend 3 AP to attempt to overcome a circle it is adjacent to. It makes a Willpower saving throw. On a success, the spell ends for that creature.
